last_episode_to_air.name: Niecy Nash-Betts
last_episode_to_air.overview: Kevin Hart sits down with longtime friend, actress, writer and gift from heaven Niecy Nash-Betts.

name: Hart to Heart
overview: A-list entertainers, athletes and public figures reveal their honest, unfiltered and unexpected true selves over a glass of wine with Kevin Hart. No topic is off-limits as guests open up about careers, family, loss and love.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: In season 3, Hart and his guests pop the cork on a variety of topics ranging from hilarious, never-before-told stories to career defining revelations. Each one-hour, in-depth interview takes place in Hart's intimate wine cellar and will feature entertainment industry titans Bill Maher, Dr. Dre, Dwayne Johnson, Issa Rae, J.Cole, John Cena, Mark Cuban, Sofia Vergara, Will Ferrell and Will Smith.

episodes.name: Miley Cyrus
episodes.overview: Miley Cyrus joins Kevin Hart in a heart to heart conversation about her journey and development from the child starring as Hannah Montana to the current acclaimed artist she has become.

episodes.name: Don Cheadle
episodes.overview: Don Cheadle opens up about his evolution as an aspiring jazz musician and his early theater work.

episodes.name: Kelly Clarkson
episodes.overview: Talk show host and music superstar Kelly Clarkson reflects on her struggles as a young singer and her meteoric rise to stardom; Kevin and Kelly compare notes on parenting and the ups and downs of life on the road.

episodes.name: Cameron Diaz
episodes.overview: Cameron Diaz stops by the wine cellar for an in-depth talk about why she left show business, the joy of motherhood and her new career as a winemaker.

episodes.name: Taraji P. Henson
episodes.overview: Taraji P. Henson opens up about her early years pursuing her dream in Hollywood as a single mother and the tough choices she had to make along the way.

episodes.name: Jimmy Kimmel
episodes.overview: Late night comes to the wine cellar as Jimmy Kimmel stops by for a glass of wine and a chat about the twists and turns in his unpredictable career, from his early days in radio to his role as the host of his own talk show.

episodes.name: Nick Cannon
episodes.overview: Nick Cannon talks about stand-up, becoming a TV executive in his teens and his growing family.

episodes.name: Bryan Cranston
episodes.overview: Bryan Cranston and Kevin discuss their relationships with their fathers and fatherhood.

episodes.name: John Travolta
episodes.overview: John Travolta discusses his career and what helped him weather personal and professional setbacks.

episodes.name: Ice Cube
episodes.overview: Ice Cube on his love of comedy, hiring Black comedians for his films and his role as an activist.

episodes.name: Jay Leno
episodes.overview: Jay Leno shares his stories of navigating Hollywood and his long tenure at "The Tonight Show"

episodes.name: Pete Davidson
episodes.overview: Pete Davidson opens up about his relationship with the media and learning to handle public scrutiny.

episodes.name: Jay-Z
episodes.overview: Jay-Z talks about the strategies he used to make his journey from street hustler to a global brand

episodes.name: Chris Rock
episodes.overview: Chris Rock reflects on stand-up, his movie career and the long history that he shares with Kevin.

episodes.name: Mark Wahlberg
episodes.overview: Mark Wahlberg shares wine, his own tequila brand and tales from his storied career.

episodes.name: Tracee Ellis Ross
episodes.overview: Tracee Ellis Ross shares her evolution as an acclaimed comedic actress and lessons she's learned.

episodes.name: Mike Tyson
episodes.overview: Mike Tyson explains how he overcame his troubled past and his continual quest to learn and grow.

episodes.name: Saweetie
episodes.overview: Saweetie chats about mental health, fame and expanding her hip-hop success into a media company.

episodes.name: Tyler Perry
episodes.overview: Tyler Perry reveals the hard work and luck that led him to create an entertainment empire.

episodes.name: Kristen Stewart
episodes.overview: Kristen Stewart on the worldwide recognition from "Twilight" and her family keeping her grounded.

episodes.name: Simu Liu
episodes.overview: Simu Liu on rising from struggling actor to global star in the world of Marvel superheroes.

episodes.name: Seth MacFarlane
episodes.overview: Seth MacFarlane explains his many roles in the entertainment business and his creative process.

episodes.name: Sofia Vergara
episodes.overview: Sofia Vergara brings the heat in a lively conversation about her head-turning role on "Modern Family" and the entrepreneurial mindset shaping the next chapter of her career.

episodes.name: John Cena
episodes.overview: John Cena visits the wine cellar and reminisces on his humble beginnings, his path to the WWE and Hollywood stardom.

episodes.name: Dr. Dre
episodes.overview: The legendary Dr. Dre gets personal during a deep dive into his prolific career, the evolution of hip-hop and the methodology behind his music.

episodes.name: Will Ferrell
episodes.overview: Will Ferrell brings laughter to Kevin's wine cellar as he recalls the heyday of SNL, his most memorable scene partners and what's next on his bucket list.

episodes.name: Issa Rae
episodes.overview: Issa Rae joins Kevin for an intimate conversation about her meteoric rise from YouTube stardom to becoming a media mogul.

episodes.name: Mark Cuban
episodes.overview: Billionaire philanthropist Mark Cuban shares his biggest tips for succeeding in business while reflecting on the decisions that changed his life and the importance of family.

episodes.name: Bill Maher
episodes.overview: Comedian Bill Maher joins Kevin for a no-holds-barred conversation about the intersection of comedy and politics and what it's like to open for Diana Ross.

episodes.name: J. Cole
episodes.overview: J. Cole ruminates on his creative process, his undying love of basketball and how the power of meditation has shaped his life.

episodes.name: Dwayne Johnson
episodes.overview: Dwayne Johnson trades barbs with Kevin while reflecting on his metamorphosis from wrestling superstar to box-office behemoth, his business mindset and the importance of giving back to his community.

episodes.name: Will Smith
episodes.overview: Will Smith opens up to Kevin about the pursuit of happiness, turning 50 and the film roles that had a profound impact on his life.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: In season 3, Hart and his guests pop the cork on a variety of topics ranging from hilarious, never-before-told stories to career defining revelations. Each one-hour, in-depth interview takes place in Hart's intimate wine cellar and will feature entertainment industry titans Bill Maher, Dr. Dre, Dwayne Johnson, Issa Rae, J.Cole, John Cena, Mark Cuban, Sofia Vergara, Will Ferrell and Will Smith.

episodes.name: Ben Affleck
episodes.overview: After two decades, acclaimed writer, actor, director and Academy Award winner Ben Affleck breaks his silence with stories and exclusive insights in a one-on-one interview with Kevin Hart.

episodes.name: George Lopez
episodes.overview: Kevin Hart hosts a conversation with George Lopez, delving into the comedian and actor's journey from stand-up to TV icon.

episodes.name: Cynthia Erivo
episodes.overview: Hot off the set of the new film "Wicked," Cynthia Erivo joins Kevin Hart to talk about her beginnings and rise to stardom.

episodes.name: Andy Samberg
episodes.overview: From his viral video beginnings with comedy troupe "The Lonely Island" to becoming an SNL icon to starring in "Brooklyn Nine-Nine," Andy Samberg sits down for an intimately funny chat about his career with Kevin.

episodes.name: Judd Apatow
episodes.overview: Judd Apatow joins Kevin for a sidesplitting and eye-opening conversation.

episodes.name: Niecy Nash-Betts
episodes.overview: Kevin Hart sits down with longtime friend, actress, writer and gift from heaven Niecy Nash-Betts.
